metadata.title: CVE-2023-6936 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In wolfSSL prior to 5.6.6, if callback functions are enabled (via theWOLFSSL_CALLBACKS flag), then a malicious TLS client or network attackercan trigger a buffer over-read on the heap of 5 bytes (WOLFSSL_CALLBACKS isonly intended for debugging).

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
